code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import deleteCard from"../images/Papelera.svg";import likeCard from"../images/like.svg";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.owner===currentUser._id;var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__delete ".concat(isOwn?"element__delete-visible":"");var isLiked=props.likes.some(function(item){return item===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="icon-like ".concat(isLiked?"icon-like_black":"");function handleClick(){props.onCardClick(props.card);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props.card);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,src:deleteCard,alt:"Icono de papelera para eliminar",onClick:handleDeleteClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__image",src:props.link,alt:props.name,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.link,")")},onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__footer-photo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"element__title",children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"likes-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,src:likeCard,alt:"Icono de coraz\xF3n",onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"likes-card__count",children:props.likes.length})]})]})]},props.card._id);}export default Card;
